reviewText: Love Pam Grier! She's a classic beauty and actress!

Pam Grier personifies the definition of a sexy woman in the 70's. She's a great actress as well having come from a background that was more about modeling. Yes, she was in fact exploited by Hollywood at the time; however, she came about when black America was just shaking off the oppression of segregation. Pam Grier is an icon. She's not ghetto nor hood as so many black females have become, she sexy, elegant, classy, beautiful,  and Foxy.
